original_text: But if you pay him money for his work, he must not eat the food. A visitor also must not eat the food.

sentences.original_text: But if you pay him money for his work
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신이 그의 일에 돈을 지불한다면

sentences.original_text: he must not eat the food
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 음식을 먹어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: A visitor also must not eat the food
sentences.korean_translation: 방문객 또한 그 음식을 먹어서는 안 됩니다
